text: Dušan Karol (born 19 May 1983) is a former professional tennis player from the Czech Republic. ==Biography== Born in Jihlava, Karol was a right-handed player, with a double handed backhand. As a junior he had a win over Tomas Berdych at the Czech Indoor Championships and in another tournament defeated Marcos Baghdatis without dropping a game. He made it to a high as seven in the world in doubles during his junior career. Karol played on the Challenger circuit as a professional player and won a total of four titles over the course of his career, all in doubles. He is now the coach of young Czech player Markéta Vondroušová. ==Challenger titles== ===Doubles: (4)=== {|class="sortable wikitable" !style="width:20px" class="unsortable"|No. !style="width:40px"|Year !style="width:220px"|Tournament !style="width:50px"|Surface !style="width:200px"|Partner !style="width:200px"|Opponents !style="width:160px" class="unsortable"|Score |- |1. |2008 |Rijeka, Croatia |Clay | Jaroslav Pospíšil | Alex Kuznetsov Dick Norman |6–4, 6–4 |- |2. |2008 |Oberstaufen, Germany |Clay | Jaroslav Pospíšil | André Ghem Boy Westerhof |6–7(2), 6–1, 10–6 |- |3. |2008 |Tarragona, Spain |Clay | Daniel Köllerer | Marc Fornell Mestres Marc López |6–2, 6–2 |- |4. |2009 |Freudenstadt, Germany |Clay | Jan Hájek | Martin Kližan Adil Shamasdin |4–6, 6–4, 10–5 |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Czech male tennis players Category:Czech tennis coaches Category:Sportspeople from Jihlava
